card.card: {"item":{"at_control":"","category":"daily","description":"一头金色长发配上精致的面容，伸展的躯体显露娴熟的舞蹈功底。谁知下一秒那张脸却换上了气鼓鼓的神情。“这家伙铁定不好惹啊”——对你的这种初印象持续了很长一段时间。\n但看到你会鼓励羞涩的伙伴登台自介，也会大咧咧追问老师奖励的内容，这着实让人震惊了。这可是在剑拔弩张的舞台上啊，而你竟然是可爱得如此纯粹？\n生日快乐，西条克洛迪娜。我想你不用担心曾经少年天才的自己渐渐变得泯然众人。能保持这份赤子之心，你注定已经不凡。（图2为少歌动画画师谷紫织老师所画）","id":30106832,"is_fav":0,"pictures":[{"img_height":1080,"img_size":132.5849609375,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/13a880a896a27ce4ae3a42568c7459658e02e0ea.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":1920},{"img_height":1280,"img_size":155.84765625,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/282783dcd027e0af80b405bbec105cb9dd07b3f9.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":1024},{"img_height":750,"img_size":2375.0458984375,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/bc93bbcbd8ac7fbbe791cb4c5afb23c7f1c77279.png","img_tags":null,"img_width":1334}],"pictures_count":3,"reply":79,"role":[],"settings":{"copy_forbidden":"0"},"source":[],"title":"","upload_time":1564596351},"user":{"head_url":"https:\/\/i1.hdslb.com\/bfs\/face\/7626da8b83eb3872860f9f9c7496a8f800c480b1.jpg","name":"圣翔音乐学院放送科","uid":234441166,"vip":{"avatar_subscript":0,"due_date":1579017600000,"label":{"label_theme":"","path":"","text":""},"nickname_color":"","status":0,"theme_type":0,"type":1,"vip_pay_type":0}}}
